subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jeff Carter scored two goals, including the game-winner with 1 minute 2 seconds remaining, as the visiting Flyers snapped a nine-game losing streak with a 2-1 victory over the Atlanta Thrashers Sunday.
snippet: Jeff Carter scored two goals, including the game-winner with 1 minute 2 seconds remaining, as the visiting Flyers snapped a nine-game losing streak with a 2-1 victory over the Atlanta Thrashers Sunday.
